column2: We are inviting our dearest friends and family to join us on our special day. We look forward to seeing you. Please reply so we can make the proper arrangements.

Ayman & Marina Wedding( Mino & Maro ): Soul of Morocco Back To Cairo
column2:
The sensual, soulful and refined Moroccan singer OUM has played in Paris & many other cities in France and abroad with a larger & larger public.

An exceptional singer with a scintillating look, OUMสผs latest album Soul Of Morocco manages the feat of being a beguiling synthesis of jazz and Moroccan music but is above all clearly music of today. An album which also allows us to discover an artist who is at the same time moving, sincere, committed and modern.

OUM will perform at the El Genaina Theater ูุณุฑุญ ุงูุฌูููุฉ in Cairo on Saturday 9th May 2015.

We request the pleasure of your company to celebrate our wedding. 

We would like to thank our family and friends for your love, support and friendship through out the years. 

We hope that you can all join us on this very special occasion to share in the joy of our marriage.
